OOC: I should have mentioned this but all of their weapons would be disabled. 
The room basically keeps them under control.

IC:

         As Blacknightmare and Chaostaur speak, a portion of the wall between 
the two opens and the mysterious infecticon steps into the room. The same 
Infecticon that Blacknightmare had fought in the simulator where she was 
enslaved by the Infecticons, the Infecticon she knew as a the smaller form of 
the Infecticon god, the Bamphomet. The Infecticon stands there for a moment 
between the two as it looks silently at each, its cold blue visor glowing 
lightly as the wall clsoes behind him.

Bamphomet: "Welcome each of you, to your new home. Both of you are in debt to 
us and now shall serve us. However, you Chaostaur have more freedom then 
Blacknightmare. She ahsdevices in her body that allow us to control her 
whenever she feels rebelious. Now then, what say you now?"

--part1_103.1001a5f3.298bd952_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
